headings: Gain in-depth knowledge about regional, national and international security issues.
Admission Requirements, Degree Plan and Courses
What Can You Do With a Homeland Security Degree?
Why Earn My Homeland Security Master’s Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: In our nationally recognized online homeland security degree program, you will delve into a comprehensive range of topics, including everything from terrorism and counter-terrorism, federal immigration laws and international trafficking - to biological and radiological hazards and responses.

You will also join a global community of like-minded students while you interact with professors who are acknowledged experts in their fields. Plus, since this degree is offered completely online, you can access our award-winning program from anywhere in the world.
Our professors stay up to date with current homeland security issues and regularly publish their research. They are also dedicated to providing the best possible online learning experience.
Our faculty are a primary reason we continue to gain national recognition - and why Angelo State has become a top university to earn your master’s degree in homeland security online.
Tuition & FeesWe don’t sacrifice quality for affordability. Angelo State is committed to helping you achieve your educational goals with as little debt as possible.

ASU Distinguished Graduate ScholarshipsEarn our premier graduate scholarship based on your highest degree GPA. Once you are admitted to an ASU graduate program, you will automatically be considered. No application is necessary.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.

The increasing complexity of national security issues is driving an ongoing demand for homeland security professionals and a steady growth in border and homeland security and emergency management jobs.
With your ASU homeland security degree, you will be prepared to start or advance your career in the military, emergency management or local, state and federal law enforcement.
Our program is annually ranked among the best and most affordable in the nation by multiple online higher education guides, including Intelligent.com, PublicServiceDegrees.com and many others.

You can earn anEmergency Management Certificateby completing a specific four-course sequence within your degree plan. That means you can get a valuable added credential to help advance your career without having to take extra classes.

We have existing Articulation Agreements with various universities, military branches and federal agencies, including the National Security Agency and National Cryptologic University, which allow you to receive academic credit for prior training related to intelligence and homeland security.

Whether you’re pursuing a master’s degree, doctoral degree or certificate/certification, you have access to all the services in ourCollege of Graduate Studies and Research. You’ll find information and resources for everything from registering for classes and writing a thesis – to available graduate/teaching assistantships and graduate research opportunities.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
